0.3 (2008-07-27)
----------------

- fix Content-Length header sent after code injection.

- add `e.stopPropagation()` to the `Add more file` link

----------------

- add docs/ folder to auto generate documentation with sphinx

- use jquery packed version

- IE javascript fixes

- first version
